About Us

Apex Siding & Intera Homes is a team of professionals specializing in siding installation, window and door replacements, and customized exterior solutions serving the Sacramento area. We hold a valid CSLB license and have over 2.5 years of experience working with top-quality materials like James Hardie to ensure durability and style.

Read More

Services

We offer siding, door and window installation, and full exterior remodeling. Every project is completed with quality and attention to detail.

  • Siding Working

    Give your home a fresh look with durable, weather-resistant siding. We ensures quality installation and reliable repairs that last.

  • Door Installation

    A new door can improve both security
    and style. We install doors with precision, making your entryway strong and welcoming.

  • Window Installation

    Upgrade your home with modern, energy-efficient windows. Our experts provide flawless installation for comfort and savings.

  • Exterior Remodeling

    Transform the look of your home with a complete exterior remodel. From concept to completion, we bring your vision to life.
